snacks.name: Veggie Pizza
snacks.description: Zucchini, peppers, olives, spinach, tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese.

snacks.name: Veggie Burger
snacks.description:
Grilled spiced potato and pea patty served on a bun with cheese, lettuce, tomato, ketchup, and mustard.
Vegan upon request.

desserts.name: Carrot Cake
desserts.description: Moist and lightly spiced cake with grated carrots, almonds, and shredded coconut.

drinks.name: Mango Lassi
drinks.description: Refreshing yogurt-based mango smoothie, naturally sweetened.
